Replace.Text: How dare you! All that you hold dear will turn to ash!
We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from God’s path, and now we will correct it.
You dare attack my sovereign realm? I don't believe even Nostradamus could have predicted this!
Hah! Osiris will be pleased to welcome my enemies.
I have defeated enemies ten times as powerful as you. You will be just one more for the historians.
My attempts to avoid violence have failed. An eye for an eye only makes the world blind.
I will enjoy hearing your last breath when you witness the destruction of your people.
You must not know: Spartans only return with their shield, or on it.
This will make a great saga! The skalds will sing of my valor!
The Divine Wind will protect us and you will fall, like the others.
You can see how fruitless this will be for you, no?
Soldiers are not like trees. When they are destroyed, they are not so easily replaced.
Your war is hopeless. You have not learned from history. Conquering Russia is impossible. He who lives by the sword, dies by the sword!
You think your army can compare with my armada… with the might of my empire? You are grievously mistaken.
You have asked for war and I will give it to you.
I warn you against making a habit of shedding blood. Blood never sleeps.
If I must choose between righteousness and peace, I choose righteousness.
You have betrayed the trust of Tomyris and now you will pay!
Your hubris will be your end. No power can defeat Rome.
War? We are not amused.
You have what I want, and I take what I want.
Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Kongo— not to my people!
Masquerading as friends was kind of fun, wasn't it? Unfortunately it's time to drop the pretense and get to the business at hand.
I have had enough with you. May Amun-Re guide us!
Let it be known: you are an enemy of Germany and must be destroyed. May God have mercy on you, for I will not.
I can engage in this war without sacrificing morals. Don’t ask me how; you wouldn’t understand.
Why do I fight? Because I can… because Inanna demands it. Now you will know the power of Sumer!
Now, we will test your strength! Prepare yourselves!
Now comes a storm you cannot escape. You can only hope for a quick death.
I will not allow the Empire to suffer you any longer. The time has come to end this charade!
I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed.
This is for the greater good. You will understand… in time.
I hereby proclaim you an enemy to Russia, our allies, and God, may he have mercy on your soul.
You have transgressed against my kingdom and the kingdom of God… you must answer for your sins.
You are a seed of evil. You must be destroyed.
It is a shame that we must resort to violence, it is not the custom of kings to kill kings.
I wanted to avoid this, you know, but your idea of peace left me no choice.
The Empress calls for your head. You will be drowned in your own blood!
Prepare yourselves for war. Our armies will stop at nothing; our navies will swarm your shores, for the glory of Rome.
As our protests are in vain we hereby declare war.
You'll pay for this in time!
That is too bad. I thought we were friends.
(Declares a Surprise War against you)

(Declares a Reconquest War against you)
(Declares a Liberation War against you)
(Declares a Protectorate War against you)
(Declares a Colonial War against you)
